robotic_slashmoderate: a very thin line of solder
robotic_slashsevere: a pair of soldered, straight cracks
an area of freshly replaced metal
has some deep welded scratches on the metal
robotic_slashcritical: a matrix of desperately soldered wide cracks
a series of deep and wide welded gashes
robotic_piercemoderate: a dot of fresh metal in a small hole
robotic_piercesevere: a small patch of fresh metal in a small hole
robotic_piercecritical: a large splot of hardened solder
an inward caving hole leading to fresh metal
dismember: has some fresh metal around various joints
has some solder marks securing various joints
